events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and still haven't received any shipping updates. The delivery is very late, and I need assistance with tracking my package.
The issue has been categorized under Delivery Delay based on the customer's report about late shipping and tracking problems.
The case has been assigned to a customer support agent specializing in shipping and delivery issues to provide assistance.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I’m sorry to hear your delivery is delayed. I’ll do my best to help you with this.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking information you have received so far? This will help me track the package.
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I have not received any tracking emails or updates from the seller or the courier service.
I checked your order status and contacted the courier. The package was delayed due to unforeseen shipping issues but should arrive within the next three days.
Thank you for the update. I’m glad there is a tentative delivery date now, though the delay has been inconvenient.
We have resolved the delay issue by coordinating with the courier, and your package should be delivered soon. Please let us know if you face any further issues.
Just checking in to confirm that your order has arrived and that you are satisfied with the resolution of the delivery delay.
Since we have not heard further from you, we are closing this case. Feel free to contact us anytime if you need more help.
